metadata.title: CVE-2018-9861 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Enhanced Image (aka image2) plugin for CKEditor (in versions 4.5.10 through 4.9.1; fixed in 4.9.2), as used in Drupal 8 before 8.4.7 and 8.5.x before 8.5.2 and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script through a crafted IMG element.

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
